thread.section_title: Wyckes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wyckes | www.wyckes.com
thread.title: Edgar

author: Edgar
title: Edgar
text: I don't necessarily like buying furniture but i move quite often and i try to remodel every year. Smaller things like coffee tables lamps chairs etc. I've been to other funiture stores and it's all pretty standard. You walk in, pick something you like or something out of a catalog and you place your order. Not here, the staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and professional! I don't ever walk out of there feeling like I got hustled. I leave happy and i've been shopping with rich for close to 4 years now. Just furnished my little sisters room and everything was very easy to assemble. The bedframe was easy, desk chair was easy, lamps were easy. The desk took me 1 hour& 20 minutes to assemble but only because i'm slow with the drill Lol the instructions are and always have been on point. I had a couple questions and called in and they took the time to explain everything to me. They didn't rush me off the phone knowing i wasn't calling about a sale. Highly recommended with incredible prices!
